attributes.action: Expatriate benefit cheats and their accomplice's
attributes.background: Having seen many programs on TV where people openly admit how to cheat the system & get money for nothing (except for lies), it isn't fair on the tax payers or the people who are wrongly denied benefits. The current consequences are trivial or not applied & appear to do nothing to stop the problem.

rejection.details:
We think that you may wish to deport (remove from the UK) or expropriate (remove the property of) benefit cheats and their accomplices.

If you would like to redraft and resubmit your petition it will be reconsidered.
